title: How Winston Churchill's office became the ballast for the Hinduja empire’s first foray into luxury hospitality
description: ​The Hindujas’ first foray in the rarefied world of super-luxe hospitality is the newly-opened Old War Office (OWO) as a Raffles hotel in London’s Whitehall. A one-night stay at the Churchill Suite here comes for an eye-watering 25,000 pounds, which is about Rs 25.8 lakh.
